domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

entity.name: Going Out
entity.description: This entity tracks all conversations about going out.

text:
Example of coverage combining coronavirus and the massive protests: 

Cable news doc advises protesters bring hand sanitizer, avoid touching, wear a mask “if you can.” 

Then the doctor says he was protesting too, despite "preaching against going out and being near other people”: https://t.co/n2dF9W9ywO
